casebody.data:
AZURE DOLPHIN, LLC, et al.
v.
BARTON, et al. 128A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 15, 2018 Peter J. Juran, Attorney at Law, M. Rachael Dimont, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Chad A. Archer, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Azure Dolphin, LLC, et al. Alan M. Ruley, Attorney at Law, Andrew A. Freeman, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Barton, Justin, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of August 2018 by Counsel for Plaintiff-Appellant to Withdraw as Appellate Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of August 2018."
